comment: Coach Bucky is very chill and easy to talk to; grading is based on a pre/post skills test, game report, laws of the game, terms & field dimensions, and attendance; class consists of doing basic drills of dribbling, attacking, ball control, & striking; lets us play against one another at the end of class & sometimes w/another class
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things
